message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a price of $1,150,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider a price of $1,050,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I understand your budget constraints, the value of this product is substantial. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,125,000.  Let me know if this works for you.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I am willing to negotiate at $1,100,000. I hope this proposal is more suitable for us both.
